commented_on_trip: I've asked {{user}} to share a ride between {{tripStart}} and {{tripEnd}} on {{date}}. Click below to see the ride.
asked_trip: I want to share a ride between {{tripStart}} and {{tripEnd}} on {{date}}. Does anyone have a suggestion?

created_group: I've just added the group {{name}} at The #RidesharingMovement. Would you like to rideshare with us?
share_offered_trip: {{user}} offers a ride between {{tripStart}} and {{tripEnd}} on {{date}}.
share_asked_trip: {{user}} asks for a ride between {{tripStart}} and {{tripEnd}} on {{date}}.
